ValidationRule.description: Records cannot be updated once the case is submitted, except by System Admin and the Integration Profile. Vouchers are excluded as well as a separate rule is defined.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Profile.Name = 'Integration Profile') && NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator') && NOT(RecordType.Name == 'Voucher') && ( ISPICKVAL(00Nb0000005Wtod.00Nb0000007MkPm, 'Awaiting Approval') || ISPICKVAL(00Nb0000005Wtod.00Nb0000007MkPm, 'Approved') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No changes are allowed to Compensation records when the Case has been submitted or approved
